title: Design and Performance Evaluation of All-Inorganic AgTaS3 Perovskite Solar Cell

Tanvir Ahmed, Md. Choyon Islam, Md. Alamin Hossain Pappu, Md. Islahur Rahman Ebon, Sheikh Noman Shiddique, Mainul Hossain, Jaker Hossain
Narrow bandgap AgTaS3 perovskite can offer highly efficient thin film solar cells (SCs) and become Si counterparts that are leading on the market. Here, we study the response of n-CdS/p-AgTaS3/p+-Al0.8Ga0.2Sb...
